CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 28cm High Explosive Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with TNT explosive and fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 30cm High Explosive Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Improved large size rocket filled with TNT explosive and fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 32cm Incendiary Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with fuel.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 21cm High Explosive Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with TNT explosive and fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 15cm High Explosive Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with TNT explosive and fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 15cm High Explosive Rocket(D)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with TNT explosive and fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 15cm Smoke Rocket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size rocket filled with chemical to produce huge smoke screen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 21cm Anti-Concrete Howitzer Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Primitive bunker buster shell, when grenades and demolition charge is not powerful enough for the job.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 21cm High Explosive Howitzer Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A 113kg shell filled with TNT and fragments, powerful enough to smack large buildings and fortification.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 21cm High Explosive Anti-Concrete Howitzer Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Improved version of the previous one, with larger explosive payload and fragment but it reduce the direct impact damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 120mm Canister Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Equivalent of shotgun's buckshot but for 120mm cannons.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 120mm HESH Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: High-Explosive Squash Head ammunition for 120mm cannons.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 120mm Stun Shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Non-Lethal Stun ammunition for 120mm cannon.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 3.7cm Pzgr.Patr.mit Bdz. 5103º(APHE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing High Explosive ammunition for 3.7cm cannon, actually more metal slug than explosive payload so don't expect too much blast radius and fragmentation from it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 3.7cm Gr.Sprgr 40 mit A.Z.39(HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: High Explosive ammunition for 3.7cmm cannon, standard AA shells, very effective counter light armored/soft target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 3.7cm Pzgr. 40/37(APCR)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing, Composed Rigid ammunition for 3.7cm cannon, High velocity solid slug design purely for armor penetration with concentrated kinetic energy through a small impact area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 5cm Pzgr. 39(APHE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing High Explosive ammunition for 50mm cannon, actually more metal slug than explosive payload so don't expect too much blast radius and fragmentation from it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 5cm Sprgr. 38(HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: High Explosive ammunition for 50mm cannon, not that powerful but it gets the job done.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 5cm Pzgr. 40(APCR)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing, Composed Rigid ammunition for 50mm cannon, High velocity solid slug design purely for armor penetration with concentrated kinetic energy through a small impact area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 7.5cm Pzgr 39(APCBC-HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing Capped Ballistic Cap - High Explosive ammunition for 75mm AT gun, still more metal slug than explosive charge so don't expect too much blast radius and fragmentation from it, the Ballistic Cap increase the stability of the projectile but it add extra weight for the projectile which reduce the travel speed slightly.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 7.5cm Sprgr.Patr.34(HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard 7.5cm High Explosive ammunition for light artillery, relatively low velocity projectile loaded with explosive payload.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 7.5cm Pzgr 40(APCR)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing Composite Rigid ammunition for 75mm cannon, designed to take out Armored Target with purely concentrated kinetic energy in high speed, rather expensive to produce due the usage of Tungsten.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 7.5cm Gr.Patr.38 HL/B(HEAT)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard 7.5cm High Explosive Anti-Tank ammunition for light artillery and assault gun, usually short barrel cannon, to give them anti-tank capability during unexpected encounter with armored target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 128mm Pzgr. 40/43(APC)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing Capped ammunition for 128mm cannon, actually more metal slug than explosive charge so don't expect too much blast radius and fragmentation from it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 12.8cm Pzgr. 39/43(APCBC-HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing Capped Ballistic Cap - High Explosive ammunition for 128mm cannon, still more metal slug than explosive charge so don't expect too much blast radius and fragmentation from it, the Ballistic Cap increase the stability of the projectile but it add extra weight for the projectile which reduce the travel speed slightly.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 12.8cm Sprgr. L/5(HE)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard 128mm High Explosive ammunition for AA purpose, devastating explosive and fragmentation effect, and thanks to the size of the projectile, is powerful enough to knockout medium vehicle without any anti-explosive defense with a direct hit.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 12.8/8.8cm Pzgr. Ts(APCR)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Armor Piercing Composite Rigid ammunition for 128mm cannon, designed to take out Armored Target with purely concentrated kinetic energy in high speed, the ammunition is compose of a single piece of 88mm slug fixed with 2 rings for stabilization, supercharged by 128mm case, not entirely an APFSDS but close.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 155mm W48 AFAP shell
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: W48 Artillery Fired Atomic Projectile(AFAP) for 6.1" artillery, it's not powerful as any conventional Nuclaer warheads but still, careful with where you are aiming with it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 155mm ADAM shell(AP)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Area Denial Artillery Munition(ADAM) for 6.1" artillery, drops 36 M67 Anti-Personnel mines after the shell is opened, don't walk over them.
